title: Setting the pace
creator_credit: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, Movietonenews and Tom Cummiskey
brief_description: In Kentucky blue grass country at Walnut Hall farm where harness racing blue bloods dates back to the turn of history, the young yearlings are raised until spring when it is time to train at Hanover farm. Harness racing is very popular with up to 40,000 spectators attending at Gosham park. This film tells the story from breeding the horse to the final goal of racing the horse.
